Welcome to the Freetable Documentation Project. Everything required to recreate Freetable lies within these pages. Feel free to create an account and contribute. If you see something that should change structurally, please head over to our forum and create a topic under wiki changes. If you have an addon that you would like to contribute documentation to, please do it under Addons Documentation:
